title: Convenient Location, Hot Tub, Garages, Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: Welcome home to Volta on Pine
Welcome home to Volta on Pine, where convenience and comfort maximize your routine.
Our new luxury apartments in Long Beach, CA, have everything you need to step into a life of both ease and sophistication in a place that instantly feels like home.
Find plenty of space to call your own in our 1, 2, or 3 bedroom apartments.
Designed with the resident in mind, our community features a Sky Lounge, a resort-style pool and hot tub, and a fitness center to enhance daily urban living.
With close access to restaurants, shops, parks, beaches, and entertainment, you can step into the local lifestyle right outside your door.
Grab a bite or your favorite brew at Rose Park Roasters, Pacific Tacos, or The 4th Horseman, and fall in love with our friendly, coastal community.
Come home to Volta on Pine and come home to better living.
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 595 Sq.
At Volta on Pine in Long Beach, we love your pets just as much as you do!
Because of that, Volta on Pine is not just a pet-friendly property, but a pet-enthusiastic property.
Your pets will find just as inviting a home here as you will.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
